successes.title: Ring by logbar - Shortcut Everything
successes.description: Wearable Input Device that lets you control anything. Gesture control, text transmission, payment, and more!

Pledges.description: SPECIAL THANKS! Thank you for your support and helping us make Ring possible! You'll receive backer-only updates on the progress of Ring and SDK/API.

SUPPORTER SPECIAL: We will make an Ebook magazine for describing our journey from 2013 until Ring’s launch. It will contain numerous pictures and stories about Ring and our team members, as well as explaining Ring's history and unique features!

VERY EARLY BIRD (Get One Ring) : Receive Ring before anyone else! You will receive the same item as the $165 and $185 pledge. This is for very early birds — we can only offer a limited number, at this price.
EARLY BIRDS (Get One Ring) : You’ll get one Ring! Receive the same Ring as the $145 and $185 pledge — we can only offer a limited number, at this price.
GET ONE Ring: You’ll get one Ring! (Includes Ring device, battery stand and MicroUSB cable) Need iOS or Android (ver. 4.4 or higher) device to activate Ring.

DEVELOPER SPECIAL WITH SUPPORT: You’ll receive one Ring and early SDK(iPhone/Android) / WEB API ACCESS. In addition, you will GET Direct Access to Our Support Team (We'll provide you our developer’s email address, so that we can assist you anytime.)

PARTNER SPECIAL: Let’s discuss your business, apps, and more! If you have any ideas for new ways to utilize Ring, you will be invited to our office in either California or Tokyo, so that we can discuss them with you! In addition, you will have the privilege of being able to see Ring before shipping!
